sentences.en: Girls sometimes use ribbons to tie their hair in a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 女孩子有时候喜欢用丝带扎马尾辫.

sentences.en: Grabbing his ponytail, Shirley gave it a yank.
sentences.cn: 雪莉抓住他的马尾辫，猛地一拽。

sentences.en: Her long, fine hair was swept back in a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 她纤细的长发在脑后梳成了马尾辫。

sentences.en: Long hair is cool. Tying it back in a ponytail is not.
sentences.cn: 长发很酷. 但将其在脑后梳成马尾辫就不是那么回事了.

sentences.en: My ponytail danced with my happiness.
sentences.cn: 我的马尾辫跳与我的幸福.

sentences.en: Putting my hair in a 14 ponytail keeps it out of my face.
sentences.cn: 把头发扎成马尾就不会打到脸上了.

sentences.en: Saito called out on a recent week day , her long ponytail shaking as she hopped.
sentences.cn: 她在跳舞时, 长长的马尾辫左右摆动.

sentences.en: She has long hair and often puts it in a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 她在马尾辫有长的头发和经常投入它.

sentences.en: She tied her hair up into a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 她把她头发梳成了个马尾辫.

sentences.en: She wears her hair in a ponytail.
She wore a tight black leather blazer over a black turtleneck stiffly in a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 她穿着紧身黑色皮衣,内穿一件高领宽松毛衣,脑后扎一条马尾辩.

sentences.en: She's Venus in blue jeans, Mona Lisa a ponytail. "
sentences.cn: 她是穿蓝色牛仔裤的维纳斯, 扎著马尾辫的蒙娜丽莎.

sentences.en: Teresa tied her long hair back a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 泰瑞莎把她的长发向后扎成马尾.

sentences.en: The wig is tied in a ponytail in the back.
sentences.cn: 这个假发在后面梳成马尾辫.

sentences.en: There is a bow at the end of the ponytail.
sentences.cn: 在马尾辫末尾变成躬行.

trans.tran_en: hair tied together at the back of your head and falling like a horse’s tail
